证据片段: Conversions to Standard Hydrogen Electrode Potential—To enable comparison of hightemperature and low-temperature electrochemical data, the measured values are converted to the standard hydrogen electrode (SHE) scale. First, a term is added to adjust for temperature. The value of 0.109 [15] was used in the high-temperature measurements.

证据片段: At 25°C. the rest potentials for both zirconium and Zircaloys are below the equilibrium potential for the standard hydrogen electrode, SHE. at pH 5.5 and for pH2 = 1 bar.

证据片段: The rest potentials of the intermetallics are more noble than the SHE.

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_033_chunk5
证据片段: The effect of coupling the zirconium alloy matrix to the intermetallic alloy at 25°C was demonstrated experimentally

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_033_chunk5
证据片段: Weight gain data performed in steam help explain the role intermetallics play in the development on the oxide film. The higher relative weight gain of the intermetallics suggest that, when the intermetallic particles are incorporated into the growing oxide layer and are electrically isolated from the metal substrate, they will oxidize and or break up.

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_033_chunk6
证据片段: Many nodule precursors were observed after exposure to $5 0 0 \mathrm { { } ^ { \circ } C }$ steam on materials expected to have both good and poor nodule resistance.

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_033_chunk6
证据片段: The high density of intermetallic particles along the alpha-grain boundaries, typical of material quenched from the alpha $^ +$ beta zone, lowers the susceptibility of nodular corrosion by blocking or redirecting surface oxide cracks.
样品状态: material quenched from the alpha+beta zone

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_033_chunk6
证据片段: The finely dispersed intermetallic structure characteristic of Zircaloy, which has been beta-quenched late in processing, lowers nodule formation by increasing the precursor site density, thus distributing the stress fields more uniformly.

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_033_chunk6
证据片段: The larger size and randomly distributed intermetallic structure typical of material receiving final anneal(s) in the alpha zone is the least efficient in stopping nodule growth.
样品状态: material receiving final anneal(s) in the alpha zone

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_033_chunk7
证据片段: The fine distribution. however. also increases the available cathodic sites, which tends to increase the overall oxidation rate

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_033_chunk7
证据片段: beta-quenched material typically has a higher uniform oxidation rate in PWRs

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_033_chunk7
证据片段: beta-quenched material typically has a higher weight gain before nodules are visible in BWRs

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_033_chunk7
证据片段: the fine distribution of intermetallic particles, which exists for the beta-quenched material, offers many cathodic sites and, in addition, lowers the mean distance from the active anodic ring to the cathodic particle

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_033_chunk7
证据片段: This enhancement results in higher oxidation rates for late beta-quenched material in PWRs

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_033_chunk7
证据片段: the material that was beta-quenched earlier in the processing schedule have fewer, coarser intermetallic particles, which provide fewer cathodic sites and longer mean distances from the anodic ring to the cathodic site

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_033_chunk7
证据片段: the observance of nodules in both BWR environments and in >450°C steam autoclaves

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_033_chunk7
证据片段: intermetallic compounds to have a higher weight gain per mass of specimen exposed as expressed in percent weight gain

证据片段: Nodules that form in steam nucleate instead at areas high induced stress.

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_033_chunk8
证据片段: Experimental corrosion data are collected from a great number of rods taken from seven different power reactors, from the CIRENE out-of-pile loop, and from autoclave tests.

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_033_chunk8
证据片段: Measurements give an idea of the waterside corrosion behavior of Zircaloy-4 for the following encountered operating conditions in French or foreign reactors: One to four cycles of irradiation in 900 MWe PWRs.
